_GEng_Sprite_PosSet: Set the position of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_SizeSet: Set the size of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_OriginSet: Set the origin point of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_OriginSetEx: Set the origin point of a Sprite Object, to some specifique presets (most commons)
_GEng_Sprite_AngleOriginSet: Specify the angular origin of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_SpeedSet: Set the speed, and the max speed of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_SpeedAdd: Add values to the actual speed of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AccelSet: Set the acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AccelAdd: Add values to the actual acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_InnertieSet: Set the innertia of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleSet: Set the angle of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleAdd: Add a value to the actual angle of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedSet: Set the rotation (angular) speed, and the max rotation speed
_GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedAdd: Add a value to the actual rotation speed of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelSet: Set the rotation (angular) acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelAdd: Add a value to the actual angular acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_sprite_AngleInnertieSet: Set the angular innertia of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixTranslate: Change the color components of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixReset: Reset the colors of a Sprite Object
